slide.title: Zend 2 and GTK 2
slide.blurb: GTK2 released Early 2002, Zend 2 (PHP 5) is due Soon......, GTK 2 features

list.bullet: Gdk Pixbuf is now part of Gtk (this is used for loading images other than xpm's)
Better Frame buffer support (eg. For embedded devices)
New Widget GtkTreeView, A richer Tree widget which can show large data contents and allows adding of gtk widgets to cells.
